original_text: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,
korean_text: 그 안에서 너희도 진리의 말씀 곧 너희의 구원의 복음을 듣고 그 안에서 또한 믿어 약속의 성령으로 인치심을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: after that ye heard word of truth
in whom also after that ye believed
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에서 너희가 믿은 후에 또한

sentences.original_text: ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise
